item.title: OK, I Need To Try The Tom Cruise Hot Sauce Right Now
item.description: Tom Cruise has many different talents, and now his Mission: Impossible co-star Hayley Atwell reveals that the star has an extra high spice tolerance.

item.title: Dolph Lundgren On Getting Famous After His Rocky IV Role: "It Took Me About Five Years To Recover"
item.description: It took some time for Dolph Lundgren to adapt to the shock of his newfound fame after playing the iconic Soviet fighter Ivan Drago in Rocky IV.

item.title: Wes Anderson's New Black Comedy Debuts With Solid RT Score, But Where Does It Rank Among His Greatest Hits?
item.description: Wes Anderson's new black comedy movie has debuted with a solid score on Rotten Tomatoes, but where does it rank among his greatest hits?
